    • Method Detail

      • isAnyAccountRegistered

        public boolean isAnyAccountRegistered()

        Check if any account is registered or not?

        Returns:
        True if at least one account is registered else false.

      • changeCurrentAccount

        public void changeCurrentAccount(java.lang.String accountId)

      • getCurrentAccount

        public Account getCurrentAccount()

      • getAllAccounts

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.kevalpatel2106.ci.greenbuild.base.account.Account> getAllAccounts()

        Get the list of all the user class Account currently registered into the application. If there are no accounts registered yet, it will return empty ArrayList.

        See Also:
        class Account, ArrayList

      • getAccount

        public Account getAccount(java.lang.String accountId)

      • saveAccount

        public boolean saveAccount(Account account)

        Save the new class Account. If the account is already present, it will update the current account. If the account is not present, this will create new account.

        Returns:
        If the account is added/updated successfully method will return true else false.
        See Also:
        class Account

      • deleteAccounts

        public boolean deleteAccounts(java.lang.String accountId)

        Delete the class Account with accountId. If the account with accountId is not present, than method will return false.

        See Also:
        class Account

      • getAccessToken

        public java.lang.String getAccessToken(java.lang.String accountId)
